name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForEstimatedGlomerularFiltrationRateEGFRBldSerPlas
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR), Bld/Ser/Plas
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) using the CKD-EPI 2012 creatinine-cystatin C equation and  the CKD-EPI 2009 creatinine equation in blood, serum, or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) using the CKD-EPI 2012 creatinine-cystatin C equation and the CKD-EPI 2009 creatinine equation in blood, serum, or plasma.),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: Calculation of quantitative volume rate of glomerular filtration based on concentration of analyte in serum or plasma specimen (procedure)
Calculation of quantitative volume rate of glomerular filtration based on cystatin C concentration in serum or plasma specimen (procedure)
Calculation of quantitative volume rate of glomerular filtration based on creatinine concentration in serum or plasma specimen (procedure)
